title: LLM Crypto Decision Output Collection
description: Schema for storing an array of outputs from an LLM detailing a cryptocurrency operation decision.

cryptocurrency_symbol.description: The symbol of the cryptocurrency (e.g., BTC, ETH).

decision.description: The decision taken for the cryptocurrency operation.

current_amount.description: The current amount held in the cryptocurrency account.

reason.description: The explanation for why the decision was made.
